item.title: Second Year Courses + Tips
item.description: I receive a lot of DMs asking me to give feedback on second-year ECE courses, so here I’ve provided the class average of each course and my best piece of advice for success in the course. Fall Semester APS100: Orientation to Engineering Get to know your TA and listen when they talk about their experiences, they were once in your shoes and have valuable advice for how to make the best of your student experience, whether it comes to careers, clubs, or school-life balance.

item.title: Third Year
item.description: (Courses are subject to change) Fall ECE331: Analog Electronics ECE334: Digital Electronics ECE344: Operating Systems ECE552: Computer Architecture Winter ECE302: Probability and Applications ECE342: Computer Hardware ECE345: Algorithms and Data Structures ECE472: Engineering Economic Analysis & Entrepreneurship

item.title: Second Year
item.description: Fall ECE231: Introductory Electronics Textbook Notes (Chapter 3 on semiconductors missing) ECE244: Programming Fundamentals Textbook Notes MAT290: Advanced Engineering Mathematics Combined Textbook Notes Individual Chapter Notes MAT291: Introduction to Mathematical Physics Combined Textbook + Lecture Notes Individual Chapter Notes Winter ECE212: Circuit Analysis Textbook Notes (Very Rough) Formula Sheet ECE216: Signals and Systems Textbook Notes (Very Rough) ECE221: Electric & Magnetic Fields Textbook Notes (Very Rough) ECE243: Computer Organization Processor Design Lecture Notes – I have omitted all of my notes on the NIOS-V portion of the course.

item.title: First Year
item.description: Fall APS110: Engineering Chemistry and Materials Science Textbook Notes + Lecture Excerpts APS111: Engineering Strategies and Practice I Lecture Notes + Textbook Excerpts MAT188: Linear Algebra Lecture Readings Notes Winter APS106: Fundamentals of Computer Programming Textbook Notes APS112: Engineering Strategies and Practice II Lecture Notes + Textbook Excerpts ECE110: Electrical Fundamentals Lecture Notes and Textbook Notes Formula Sheet MAT187: Calculus II Lecture Readings Notes MIE100: Dynamics Textbook Notes Formula Sheet

item.title: First Year Courses + Tips
item.description: I receive a lot of DMs asking me to give feedback on first-year engineering courses, so here I’ve provided the class average of each course and my best piece of advice for success in the course. Fall Semester APS100: Orientation to Engineering (H/P/F) Get to know your TA and listen when they talk about their experiences, they were once in your shoes and have valuable advice for how to make the best of your student experience, whether it comes to careers, clubs, or school-life balance.

item.title: About Me
item.description: Iâ€™m studying Electrical and Computer Engineering (ECE) at the University of Toronto. My interests lie in FPGA engineering and digital/mixed-signal design. This summer, I’m working at Prof. Roman Genov’s Intelligent Sensory Microsystems Lab (ISML) as an FPGA Research Intern.

item.title: Course Notes
item.description: On this website, I’ve curated a collection of my course notes. If you have any questions or feedback, feel free to reach out (contact info at top right). If a course is missing, I do not have notes available to share for it. First Year Second Year Third Year
